Key Match Events: Ryan Christie broke the deadlock for Scotland
Ch√© Adams added gloss to the scoreline with a ferocious finish
Liam Cooper limped off 12 minutes before full time
Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke's team will kick off Euro 2024 with a clash against Germany, the tournament hosts
Scotland wanted to rattle home a few goals against Gibraltar, afford some much-needed minutes to fringe players and continue with preparations for the more serious business
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke is hopeful Cooper will recover in a few days from a 'knee-on-knee' collision
Clarke also offered hope to Tommy Conway, the Scotland Under-21 striker who could receive a late European Championship call-up
Clarke told his players as much at half-time that they had to do much more with their territorial superiority
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland controlled the first half but lacked punch in attack
Gibraltar had just one tame shot
The visit on Friday of Finland to Hampden Park will surely prove more insightful
Others: Clarke resisted any temptation to implement wholesale interval change
